## Planned Runoff Sampling Sites

```{r library, warning=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
```

```{r map, echo=FALSE}
SiteLatLong <-data.frame(
  lat = c(33.377278,33.78917, 33.418953), 
  lng = c(-90.672806, -90.51194, -90.899864))

Sitelabels <-c("TWR", "Mason", "21 Guns")

SiteLatLong %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(popup = Sitelabels)

```
